advise: UpperMoster is a fun and educational quiz platform offering a wide range of classic categories, from history and sports to cinema and more. All resources used are solely for identification and quality enhancement, with no claims of authorship over the material. Dive in to challenge your knowledge and enjoy learning in a dynamic and entertaining way!
not_available_warning: this feature is not available yet
length_error: the name cannot be longer than 12 characters
spacing_error: the name must contain only one word without spaces or special characters
motto: the best place to learn and have fun
cookiesP1: What are cookies? Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. These files allow us to remember your preferences and enhance your experience on future visits.
cookiesP2: What types of cookies do we use? At UpperMoster, we use cookies for the following purposes:
cookiesP3: Personalization cookies: These cookies allow us to remember your language choice and other personalization preferences, such as the website theme (light or dark mode). These cookies enhance your user experience by allowing us to tailor the appearance and behavior of the site to your preferences.
cookiesP4: How do we use cookies? We use cookies exclusively to improve your user experience on our website. The cookies we use do not collect any personal information that can identify you.
cookiesP5: User consent By visiting UpperMoster, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings.
cookiesP6: Cookie management You can control and disable cookies through your browser settings. Please note that by disabling cookies, some personalization features, such as language choice or page theme, may not be available.
cookiesP7: Changes to this policy We may update this Cookies Policy at any time. Any significant changes will be posted on our website and reflected in the last updated date.
adblockerdetected: Hello! It seems you're using an ad blocker.
adblockerdetected1: We understand that ads can be annoying, but they allow us to keep UpperMoster running and provide you with free content. Our development team invests time and effort in creating this site, and the ads help us compensate for that work.
adblockerdetected2: Please consider disabling your ad blocker or using another browser to continue enjoying our content. We appreciate your support so we can continue to improve and offer the best!
phraseGame_population: Which country has the largest population?
phraseGame_area: Which country has the largest area?
phraseGame_gdp: Which country has the highest GDP?
phraseGame_gdp_per_capita: Which country has the highest GDP per capita?
phraseGame_life_expectancy: Which country has the highest life expectancy?
phraseGame_literacy_rate: Which country has the highest literacy rate?
phraseGame_hdi: Which country has the highest Human Development Index?
phraseGame_co2_per_capita: Which country has the highest CO2 emissions per capita?
phraseGame_unemployment_rate: Which country has the highest unemployment rate?
phraseGame_military_expenditure: Which country has the highest military spending?
population_ph: Guess which country has a larger population. Can you get it right?
area_ph: Compare the areas of countries and guess which one is larger. Test your geographic knowledge!
gdp_ph: Which country has a higher GDP? Find out by playing.
gdp_per_capita_ph: Find out which country has a higher GDP per capita. Show off your economic knowledge!
life_expectancy_ph: Guess which country has a higher life expectancy. Can you identify the country with the longest life expectancy?
literacy_rate_ph: Compare literacy rates and guess which country has a higher literacy rate.
hdi_ph: Which country has a higher Human Development Index? Test your knowledge about global development!
co2_per_capita_ph: Discover which country emits more CO2 per person. Can you guess correctly?
unemployment_rate_ph: Guess which country has a lower unemployment rate. Challenge your knowledge of labor economics!
military_expenditure_ph: Compare military expenditures and guess which country spends more on defense. Can you get it right?
termcondP1: By accessing and using UpperMoster, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you should not use our website.
termcondP2: UpperMoster reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will be effective immediately upon posting on the website. It is your responsibility to review the terms regularly.
termcondP31: The content and services of UpperMoster are for personal and non-commercial use only.
termcondP32: You must not use the site for any illegal or prohibited purpose under these terms.
termcondP33: You agree not to disrupt or attempt to disrupt the operation of the site.
termcondP4: All content, design, graphics, and software of UpperMoster are the property of UpperMoster or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademarks, and other intellectual property laws.
termcondP5: UpperMoster will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the website.
privatepolsP1: At UpperMoster, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privatepolsP2: We use the information collected to: Provide and improve our services, Communicate with you, and Personalize your experience on the website.
privatepolsP3: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except as necessary to provide our services or when we are legally required to do so.
privatepolsP4: We implement various security measures to protect personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privatepolsP5: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can view our Cookies Policy for more information.
privatepolsP6: You have the right to access, rectify, and delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us through the information provided on our website.
privatepolsP7: UpperMoster reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.
cookiespolsP1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us remember your preferences and enhance your experience on the site.
cookiespolsP21: Essential Cookies: Necessary for the website to function.
cookiespolsP22: Performance Cookies: Allow us to analyze how you use the website to improve its performance.
cookiespolsP23: Functionality Cookies: Remember your preferences and personalize your experience on the site.
cookiespolsP24: Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver relevant ads based on your interests.
cookiespolsP3: You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of some parts of the website.
cookiespolsP4: We may use third-party cookies to enhance our services and deliver personalized ads. These third parties may have their own privacy policies not covered by this policy.
cookiespolsP5: UpperMoster reserves the right to modify this cookies policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.
noThereIsUser: No user exists with this email or username
errorEmailVerification: There was an error verifying the email
noParticipants: There are no participants yet. Start playing to be the first to win
updateAnnounce: The leaderboard is updated daily at 00:00 hrs (GMT-5).
clarification1: Those who collect more uppers will have a higher chance of winning on the draw day.
clarification2: The winner will have the right to choose their gift card from the preferred platform among the available options.
clarification3: We use the email address as an identifier because it will be our main means of communication with you if you win.
clarification4: It is not necessary to create an account or log in to participate. You can redeem the points you earned as a guest by entering the email address with which you want to participate.
rule1_1: Insufficient Uppers: At least 100 uppers are required to participate in the drawings. Uppers are the virtual currency earned by playing and winning points.
rule1_2: The leaderboard is updated daily at 00:00 hrs (GMT-5). This table shows the players with the most accumulated uppers.
rule2_1: The HigherLower game has a time and point multiplier system. As you progress in the game, you can earn multipliers that increase your uppers.
rule2_2: Those who accumulate more uppers will have a higher chance of winning on the drawing day. Multipliers can be key to increasing your chances.
rule3_1: The winner of the drawing will have the right to choose their gift card from the preferred platform among the available options. Gift card options include popular platforms and may vary.
rule3_2: Instead of a gift card, the winner can also opt to receive cash, subject to the specific drawing conditions.
rule4_1: We use the email address as an identifier because it will be our main means of communication with you if you are selected as a winner. Make sure to provide a valid email address.
rule4_2: It is not necessary to create an account or log in to participate. You can redeem points earned as a guest by entering the email address you want to participate with. This email will be used for notifications and confirmations.
rule5_1: By participating in the website and games, you accept our terms of use and privacy policies. We are committed to protecting your personal information and using it only for the described purposes.
rule5_2: The use of ad blockers may affect your experience on the site. We recommend disabling any ad blockers to ensure that the site functions properly.
rule6_1: Our team performs regular updates to improve the user experience and add new features. These updates may include changes to game rules, the introduction of new prizes, and improvements to the user interface.
rule6_2: Any significant changes to the rules and conditions will be notified to users via the provided email address.
rule7_1: We reserve the right to disqualify any player who uses fraudulent methods or violates the game and site rules. This includes, but is not limited to, the use of bots, multiple accounts, and any form of cheating.
rule7_2: We promote a fair and fun gaming environment for all participants. Any abusive or disrespectful behavior will be dealt with appropriately, including possible site bans.
rule8_1: In case of any dispute related to the game, drawings, or prizes, our decisions will be final and binding.
rule8_2: We strive to resolve all disputes fairly and quickly. If you have any issues or concerns, please contact our support team via the provided email address.
finalAdvice: Remember, the goal of this site is to provide a fun and exciting gaming experience. Enjoy the game and good luck in the drawings!
redeemEmailWarning: Redeem your UPPERS to start participating in the raffle for the grand prize. All your guest points will be redeemed. Enter your email to participate:
loginForFive: If you have an account, you can redeem your UPPERS for money directly. All new users receive $5USD!
canRedeemMoney: You can redeem your UPPERS for money or for points to participate in the raffle for the grand prize
redeem1: Minimum: 1,000 UPPERS, to participate in the raffle
redeem3: To exchange UPPERS for money, enter multiples of 10000
increaseAnnounce: In each draw, the prize will increase by $5 compared to the previous prize. Next prize: $30
succesfulWithdraw: Your withdrawal has been successfully completed. Please remember that it may take up to 15 business days to receive it via PayPal.
passwordAdvice: The password must have at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
